column2: Covid: Akajagari mu ngendo karabandanya muri iyi ndwi
column3: Izindi ngendo nyinshi  z'indege  zafuswe irya n'ino kw'isi mu gihe indwi itanguye, ivyo bikiyongera ku gihe c'iminsi mikuru kitagendeye neza abantu baharugwa mu bihumbi. Indege zirenga 14.000 zahagaritswe kuri uyu wa mbere, izija mu Bushinwa na Amerika zikaba arizo nyinshi, nk'uko bitangazwa n'urubuga rukurikirana ivy'ingendo z'indege, FlightAware. Amakompanyi y'indege ya Amerika  avuga ko iryo hungabana riterwa n'uko hari abakozi batorwa umugera canke bishize ukwa bonyene. Hong Kong yabujije ingendo za Kompanyi ya Korera y'Epfo, Korea Air, mu kiringo c'indwi zibiri, kuko hari abatowe ko banduye mu bo yazanye. Muri rusangi, ingendo 8.000 zarafuswe mu gihe ca weekend ndende ya Noël yatanguye ku wa gatanu. N'ubwo izo atari ingendo nyinshi ufatiye kw'ijana ku ziba zitegekanijwe muri rusangi, ico gitigiri ni kinini kurusha igisanzwe kandi gishitse mu bihe vy'umwaka aho abantu benshi baba bariko barafata ingendo zo kuja gusangira iminsi mikuru n'umuryango canke n'abagenzi. Hagati aho Amerika iriko irakurikiranira hafi ivy'amato aharugwa mu mirongo arimwo abanduye Covid mu gihe ari mu ngendo mu mazi y'ico gihugu, menshi bikaba bivugwa ko yankiwe kwinjira mu bivuko vy'amazinga ya Carraibes, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP. Ibitigiri vy'abandura biguma biduga kw'isi kubera ubwoko bushasha bwa Omicron. N'ubwo ivyigwa vya mbere vyerekanye ko Omicron itababaza cane nk'ubundi bwoko, abahinga batewe impungenge n'ibitigiru vy'abandura. Nyinshi mu ndege zafuswe ku wa mbere ni iz'amakompanyi yo mu Bushinwa, nk'uko bivugwa na FlightAware. Zirimwo China Eastern, yafuse ingendo 368, na Air China, yafise 141. Ibibuga vy'indege vya  Beijing na Shanghai nivyo bisa n'ivyakozweko kuruta, ahafuswe indege 300 muri rusangi. Hagati aho kompanyi zo muri Amerika zakozweko cane ni United, yafuse 84, na JetBlue 66. United yari yagabishije mu ndwi iheze ko ukwiyongera kw'abandura Omicron "kwagize ingaruka ku bakozi bacu b'indege no ku bakora ibikorwa vyacu". Abakozi benshi bakaba basabwa kuguma ukwa bonyene kubera baba bahuye n'abanduye. Omicron ubu nibwo bwoko bwiganje muri Amerika. Ariko n'ibirere bibi birafise uruhara. Urubura rwinshi rwiyanikiye hasi rwatumye indege zicererwa ruhungabanya n'amabarabara mu ntara ya Washington yo mu burengero ku wa Mungu, biza vyiyongera ku kajagari ko mu ngendo. Mu Bwongereza , Bristish Airways yafuse ingendo 42 ku wa mbere, nk'uko bivugwa na FlightAware. Ikibuga ca London ca Heathrow cafuse ingendo 47. Gushika ubu abantu bashika miriyoni 5,4 baramaze kwicwa na coronavirus kw'isi, ku bwa kamimuza ya Johns Hopkins yo muri Amerika. Abamaze kwandura nabo mi miriyoni 280.

column2: Guardiola ati 'Lionel Messi azorangiriza umwuga wiwe muri Barcelona'
column3: Pep Guardiola arahakana amakuru avuga ko  Lionel Messi ashobora kumuhamyva muri Manchester City, akavuga ko yizeye neza y'uko uyo mukinyi azorangiriza umwuga wiwe muri Barcelona. Imyaka yose y'umwuga wiwe, Messi, ubu afise myaka 32, ayimaze muri Barcelona, ariko mu masezerano afitaniye nayo hakaba harimwo ikigabane kimuha uburenganzira bwo kuja ahandi mu ci riza. Guardiola yaramenyereje Messi i Camp Nou hagati ya 2008 na 2012, aho yatwaye ibikombe bitatu vy'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru  rya Espanye, La Liga, hamwe n'ibikombe bibiri vy'ihiganwa rya Bulaya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo, Ligue des Champions. Guardiola ati: "Jewe ndipfuza ko yoguma hariya [muri Barça]". Uyo mumenyereza wa Man City yavuye muri Barcelona asize ayifashije gutsindira ibikombe 14 mu myaka y'inkino ine, aca aja kumenyereza umurwi Bayern Munich wo mu Budagi. Yagiye mu Budagi gutsindira ibikombe bitatu vy'ihiganwa ry' Ubudagi, Bundesliga, mu myaka itatu ikurikirana. Mu Bwongereza, myaka itatu amaze amenyereza Man City amaze gutsidindira Premier League incuro zibiri zikurikirana, 2017/2018 hamwe na 2018/2019, n'aho muri uno mwaka ibintu bitifashe neza kuko Liverpool ifise ikibanza ca mbere muri iryo higanwa iyisumvya amanota 22 mu gihe hasigaye ingiko 13 gusa. Messi, umukinyi amaze gutsindira umupira w'inzahabu incuro zitandatu, ibikombe 10 vya La Liga hamwe n'ibikombe bine vya Ligue des Champions, afise amasezerano azorangira mu 2021 muri Barcelona. Hagati aho, aherutse gushikiriza amajambo atari meza ku wujejwe ukwinonora imitsi muri Barcelona, Eric Abidal, inyuma y'aho uyu Mufaransa yagirije abakinyi ko ata shaka berekanye igihe bamenyerezwa na Ernesto Valverde aherutse kwirukanwa. Mw'ihiganwa rya Espanye, La Liga, Barcelona iza mu kibanza ca kabiri inyuma ya Real Madrid iyisumva amanota atatu. Mu gihe hari abibaza ko Guardiola ashobora kuboneraho akarondera Messi kubera icuka kibi hagati yiwe na Abidal, uyo mumenyereza wa Man City ntaco bimubwiye. Abidal na Messi bompi barabaye abakinyi biwe. Avuga ati: "Jewe sinkunda kuvuga ivyerekeye abakinyi b'iyindi mirwi". "Ndibaza ko azorangiriza umwuga wiwe muri Barcelona". Lionel Messi yashitse muri Barcelona afise imyaka 13, ni ukuvuga mu 2000, aho yatanguriye gukira umupira w'amaguru mu bana batarenza imyaka 14. Yagiye atera imbere mu buryo bw'agatangaza, aho yaduga akaja muri Barça C, hanyuma muri Barça B, gushika mu murwi mukuru, ivyo bikaba vyabaye mu gihe gito cane kitari bwabeho. Mu kw'icenda guheze, uyu mukinyi w'igitangaza aherutse gutsindira agashimwe k'umukinyi wa mbere wa FIFA mu mwaka wa 2019,  ku ncuro ya gatandatu, imbere ya Christiano Ronaldo wa Juventus na Virgil van Dijk wa Liverpool.

column2: Yegereyegere "Kwa Siyoni": Abajejwe iryo soko ntibavuga rumwe n'abarikoreramwo
column3: Abadandariza mw'isoko rya Bujumbura City Market rizwi nko kwa Siyoni barahagaritse ibikorwa vyabo kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri biyamiriza iduzwa ry'amahera yo kuriha ibibanza bakoreramwo  gushika ku ncuro zibiri. Ariko abajejwe iryo soko, bavuga yuko ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe uravye ibihe tugezemwo n'uburyo bwakoreshejwe mu kuvugurura isoko. Umupfasoni umwe muri abo badandaza bavuganye na BBC atashimye kwivuga izina, avuga ko bandikiwe amakete abamenyesha ko kuva itariki 10 z'ukwezi kwa mbere 2022 amahera bahora bariha yadugijwe incuro zibiri. Agira ati: "Batumenyesheje ko kubera ibikorwa vyakozwe muri iryo soko, ko kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere amahera twahora turiha azohinduka. Akarorero abahora bariha ibihumbi 400 ku kwezi bazoriha ibihumbi 750, abahora bariha na bo 188.800 bakazoriha 312.000. Urumva ko bagwijije incuro zibiri zirenga." Ivyo bikorwa bivugwa vyakozwe ngo ni nko kwubaka ahahagarara imiduga, gusiga isima hasi hamwe n'amabombo (robine) azana amazi mu ntumbero yo kwikingira ikiza Covid-19. Abadandariza muri  iyo soko bavuga ko batanka ko ibiciro vyoduga, ariko bagasaba ko habanza kuba inama n'ingingo. BBC yashoboye kuvugana n'uburongozi bw'iryo soko, uwitwa Joseph Dukundane atubwira yuko baravye igihe cari kihaciye amahera ataduzwa kandi ibintu vyarazimvye, hamwe n'ibikorwa vyo kuvugurura isoko baranguye, ngo ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe: Kanda ngaha wumve ico kiganiro.

column2: Ukraine-Russia: ‘Intumbero yanje ntiyari iyo gusambura Ukraine’- Putin
column3: Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya avuga ko ata bindi bitero bikomeye bikenewe muri Ukraine, imisi mike inyuma y’ibibombe bikomeye bitari bike vyatewe kuri iki gihugu kuva intambara itangura. Avuga ko ibibanza hafi  vyose vyari vyateguwe guterwa vyarashwe, kandi ko intumbero yiwe itari ugusambura Ukraine. Avuga kandi ko intumbero ya Moscou yo kwinjiza abantu 300.000 mu gisirikare izoba yashitsweko mu ndwi zibiri. Avuze ibi mu gihe ingabo z’Uburusiya ahenshi ziriko zisubira inyuma, Ukraine nayo igenda itera intambwe, inyuma y’amezi amezi hafi umunani kuva iyi ntambara itanguye. Avugana n’abanyamakuru inyuma y’ikoraniro ryahuje abategetsi b’akarere ku mugwa mukuru  wa Kazakhstan, Astana, umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya yavuze ko ibibanza 22 kuri 29 vyari vyateguwe guterwa muri Ukraine vyarashwe kandi ko igisirikare “kiriko kirashikira indwi bindi bisigaye”. Ati: "Nta bitero bikomeye bigikenewe. Ubu dufise ibindi bikorwa”. Kuva ku wa mbere, Uburusiya bwatanguje igihuhusi c’ibitero vya misire ku bisagara bitari bike vya Ukraine, mu co Putin avuga ko kwari ukwihora igitero cakozwe ku kiraro gikomeye gifatanya Uburusiya n’akarere ka Crimée/Crimea bwigaruriye. Abantu batari bake barasize ubuzima muri ibi bitero abandi barakomereka, inyubakwa nazo zirononekara. Uturere two hagati tw’umugwa mukuru Kyiv natwo nyene twarashikiriwe ku ncuro ya mbere kuva intambara yaduka. Ariko Putin avuga ko intumbero y’Uburusiya itari gusambura Ukraine, ariko ntiyicuza kuri iki gitero. Ati: "Muri make ibiriko biraba ntibiryoshe. Ariko aho nyene, [n’iyo Uburusiya budatera], ibintu biba bimeze uko bimeze, ariko gusa ibintu biba ari bibi cane kuri twebwe. Rero turiko dukora ibintu vyose neza kandi mu gihe nyaco”. Perezida Putin avuga ko abantu 200.000 bamaze kwinjizwa mu gisirikare, kandi ko muri bo 16.000 bamaze gushika ku rugamba. Yongerako y’uko abona ko bidakenewe ko abandanya atera akamo ngo abantu biyandikishe. Hagati aho, akamo yateye kateje uburakari burenze urugero mu Burusiya, bituma abagabo ibihumbi n’ibihumbi bahungira mu bihugu bibanyi. BBC kandi yabonye ko abaherutse kwinjizwa ata nyigisho zikwiye bahawe imbere y’uko barungikwa ku rugamba. Ni mu gihe igisata ca BBC gikoresha ururimi rw’ikirusiya kivuga ko camenye abasirikare b’Uburusiya barenga 7500 bamaze gupfira mu ntambara ya Ukraine. Igitigiri c’abamaze kuhapfira kizwi ko ari kinini cane, mbere hari n’amakuru avuga ko bamwe mu baherutse kwinjizwa  bishwe. Avuga ku migenderanire n’ivyahoze bigize Ubumwe bw’Abasoviyeti, Perezida Putin ashimangira ko ata ngorane intambara yateye kuri vyo. Avuga ko ari ibisanzwe ko ibihugu bimwe bimwe bigira impungenge ariko ko abandanya abibwira uko ibintu bimeze igihe cose. Hagati aho, abihweza ibintu n’ibindi bavuga ko ikibanza Uburusiya bufise mu karere kiriko kiragabanuka, mu gihe abakuru b’ibihugu nka Kassym-Jomart wa Kazakhstan  bariko bitandukanya na Putin kuri ino ntambara.

column2: Ibanki nkuru y’u Burundi igabisha amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga atisunze amategeko
column3: Umuyobozi w'igisata kijejwe kugenzura amabanki mw'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu c'u Burundi, Prosper Ngendanganya, asaba amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga kwubahiriza amategeko yashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu. Ni inyuma y'umubonano hagati y'iyo banki n'amashirahamwe agura akagurisha amafaranga wabaye  ku munsi wa kane w'iyi ndwi mu ntumbero y'ukwibutsa ayo mashirahamwe amategeko mashasha n'igituma adakurikizwa. Ku wa 17 z'ukwezi kw'icenda uno mwaka, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa gatanu, bwana Ngendakumana yaragabishije ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Avuga ko ishirahamwe rizofatwa ririko riragurisha ibiciro ry'ishakiye ko rizofatwa nk'umwansi w'igihugu kandi ko rizohanwa hisunzwe igatabu mpanavyaha. Ibanki nkuru y'igihugu imenyesha kandi ko urudandazwa rutemewe n'amategeko (marché noir) rw'amafaranga y'agaciro rwasubiye kwibonekeza cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. BRB ikababazwa n'uko ayo mashirahamwe adashaka gufasha mu kwerekana abo badandaza bo mu kinyegero bakora batubahiriza ibiciro biba vyashinzwe na BRB. Mu rugamba rwo kurwanya urudandazwa ruteye kubiri n'amategeko, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu yaremereye agashirukabute umuntu azoshobora kwerekana ishirahamwe canke inzu izogura canke izogurisha amafaranga y'agaciro hatisunzwe iryo tegeko rishasha, aho azoronswa ibihumbi 500 vy'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ni mu gihe uwuzokwerekana umuntu canke ishirahamwe rikora ritazwi n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu nawe azorosnwa ibice 10 kw'ijana (10%) vy'amafaranga yose azoba afashwe. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kani amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

column2: Ingaburo : hagati y'imboga n'inyama n'amata ni ikihe ciza ku muntu? Icigwa cakorewe ku mahasa
column3: Haheze imyaka 10, amahasa (canke impanga mu kinyarwanda) Hugo na Ross Turner banonora imitsi mu buryo biyumviriye bo nyene. Hugo avuga ati: "Umwanya munini mu vyo dukora dutegura umubiri. Kubera turi amahasa, dushobora kugereranya inzira nyinshi n'ivyo dufungura hanyuma tukamenya ibimeze neza kuri twebwe." Ni muri iyo nzira abo bavukanyi bafashe ingingo yo kugerageza ubwoko bw'imfungurwa zobamerera neza canke nabi: gufungura ivyamuka ku bikoko ntivyozana ubudasa muvyo bakora? Ayo mahasa yaritabiriye n'ivyigwa binyuranye vyagizwe n'abahinga  bo mu gisata c'ubushakashatsi ca Gemini co muri King's College i Londres mu Bwongereza. Tim Spector, umwigisha wa kaminuza asigura ati: "Dushaka gukoresha ubwo buryo bw'amahasa, basangiye vyose, kugira turabe inkurikizi y'ingaburo no kwinonora imitsi, n'ingene abo bantu bagira ingaruka zitandukanye kuri izo mfungurwa." Mu kiringo c'indwi 12, abo bavukanyi babiri baratandukanijwe: Hugo atangura kurya imboga mu gihe Ross na we yabandanije kurya inyama anywa n'amata. Bose uko ari babiri bahawe imfungurwa zitanga inguvu zingana buri musi kandi bagira imyimenyerezo imwe y'inguvu muri ico kiringo cose. Hugo yemeza ko vyamugoye kumenyera izo mfungurwa nshasha. Yagize ati::"Mu ndwi za mbere, narashatse cane inyama, amata n'iforomaji. Ivyo narya vyari birimwo ahanini ivyamwa n'imboga." Yemera kandi ko "Ku rundi ruhande sinafungura ingaburo yikwiye, bisigura ko urugero rwa 'glycemie' rutahindutse kandi numva mpaze umusi wose." Yongeyeko ati: "Nasa kandi n'umuntu afise inguvu nyinshi." Ross we avuga ko yagumye agwa avyuka. Avuga ati:"Hari igihe nagira inguvu nyinshi n'ikindi gihe nagira uburuhe budahera." Prof Spector avuga ko ubwo bushakashatsi bushobora gutuma umuntu ategera ingene umubiri ukoresha imfungurwa n'ingene ingaruka zitandukana ku muntu n'uwundi, n'aho boba ari amahasa. Ubwo budasa mbere bwaragaraaye no ku yandi mahasa, mu vyigwa vyakozwe n'uwo mushakashatsi n'abo bakorana bo kuri King's College. Prof. Spector agira ati: "Twibaza ko hari ikintu kitajanye n'imero cagize uruhara muri ivyo batoye." Nk'uko ibiharuro vya Spector bivyerekana, amahasa afise ibintu bisa ku gitigiri kiri hagati ya 25 na 30% mu dukoko turi mu mara. Nkeka rero ari co gituma ingaruka zidasa kuri bo ku mfungurwa zitandukanye. Spector aradondagura inzira utegerezwa gufata mu kugumana uburinganire bw'udukoko duto duto mu mubiri  no gutuma mu mara habamwo udukoko dutandukanye. Ahanura ati: "Ubwa mbere n'ukurya ivyatsi 30 ku ndwi." Ivyo bingana n'imboga canke ivyamwa bike buri musi. Asigura ati: "Ubwa kabiri, ni ngombwa guhitamwo ibiterwa birimwo 'polyphénols', ibintu bitanga amarangi agaragara n'icanga (gout) ry'ibintu birura ku biribwa bimwe bimwe." Intambwe igira gatatu itangwa na Spector n'ugufungura indya zirimwo udukoko duto duto "probiotiques". N'ubwoko bw'indya zirimwo udukoko duto duto dushobora kuba mu mara tukanafasha mu buringanire bw'ibiba mu nda. Izo "Probiotiques" ubu zihari ni Yaourt isanzwe, kefir na kombucha. Uyo mwigisha wa kaminuza yongerako ko " ubwa nyuma, ni ngombwa kureka ibifungurwa bihinguwe cane." Ibihinguwe cane biri mu mugwi urimwo imfungurwa zihinguye harimwo ibintu vyo mu mahinguriro vyatakaje akanovera, irangi n'icanga kama. Kuri urwo rutonde harimwo biscuits, isosi yo mu mahinguriro hamwe n'inzoga. Ross yasanze ko kuba mwenewabo yarashoboye kurya imboga gusa mu kiringo c'indwi 12 vyamuhaye icigwa gikomeye. Avuga ati: "Narashobora kubona indya nafungura uko zingana zihinguye, ivyo vyaciye binyugurura amaso kuri ico kibazo." Prof. Spector yarerekanye ko kurya imboga bidasigura ko ari ingaburo  yikwiye. Avuga ati: "Ica ngombwa, ni akaranga k'imfungurwa, si kuba ufise canke udafise inyama mw'isahani yawe." Asigura ati:"Abantu benshi batarya inyama bashobora kurya izindi ndya nyinsi zihinguye." Inyuma y'indwi 12, ibipimo vya Hugo na Ross vyerekanye ko bidatandukanye cane, n'aho bari bafunguye ibintu bitandukanye. Basanze mbere hari n'ivyo bungutse ku bintu bimwe bimwe vy'amagara yabo, nk'urugero rwa Cholesterol, ibinure canke ubudahangarwa ku ngwara y'igisukari ku bakuze. Ariko, ivyo ntivyoca vyemezwa ku bantu bose kuko bo n'abanonotsi karuhariwe, basanzwe bagira imyimenyerezo, barya imfungurwa  zipimye neza, aho guhindura gato gusa bishobora gusigura ukwongerekana canke ukugabanuka kw'ibikorwa vyo kwinonora imitsi. Ku bandu basanzwe nkatwe, Spector avuga ko kwitaho guhindura imfungurwa no kurondera ingaburo zikwije ibisabwa, bifitiye akamaro amara yacu, bishobora gufasha kugabanya uburuhe, inzara n'ibiro. Ariko impera n'imperuka, ico ubwo bushakashatsi bwakozwe kuri ayo mahasa bwaje gushimangira, n'uko ata ngaburo  yikwiye ikora kumwe kuri bose, n'aho boba ari abantu basa muri vyose. Kandi n'ayo mahasa ubwayo baravyiboneye muri ico cigwa camaze indwi 12. Hugo ahanura ati: "Narashoboye guhindura buke buke ingaburo. Ubu, ngerageza gushira ubwoko bwinshi bw'indya kw'isahani, no kubirya ntarengeje urugero. Urufunguruzo ni kubifata ku rugero rumwe." Ross na we ati: "Umuntu niyababwira ko ingaburo  kanaka izobatuma mumera uku canke kuriya, muramwibazako ikibazo. Birakenewe kuvyigeragereza, kubikora nko gufyina hanyuma urabe ibikunda kuri wewe."

column2: U Burundi ngo naho atawurwaye coronavirus arahaboneka "buriteguye"
column3: Icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'igihugu c'u Burundi, Gaston Sindimwo, yabwiye BBC ko ico gihugu citeguye kurwanya coronavirus naho ata wanduye uwo mugera arahaboneka. U Burundi ni kimwe mu bihugu bike kw'isi gushika uyu munsi hataraboneka umugwayi wa coronavirus. Ariko mu ntumbero yo kuzitira bataronerwa, leta yaramaze gufata ingingo zo gukumira ico kiza. Muri izi harimwo guhimiriza abantu kudafata ingendo, baba abinjira mu gihugu canke abashaka gusohoka hamwe no guhagarika uruja n'uruza rw'indege mu kiringo c'iminsi indwi. Basaba kandi abanyagihugu kwirinda kwegerana aho bishoboka, ndetse no gukoranako. Icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'igihugu Gaston Sindimwo yadusobanuriye ko ari nayo mpamvu mu nama nshikiranganji y'uno munsi baramukanije badakorana mu ntoke nk'uko bimenyerewe. Yagiranye ikiganiro na Florentine Kwizera, ushobora kwumva aho hejuru.

column2: Muri Tigray 'abantu barasambanijwe ku nguvu''-reta ya Ethiopia
column3: Ethiopia yemeje ivyahora bivugwa ko hari abasambanijwe ku nguvu mu ntambara ya Tigray. Abategetsi ba Ethiopia bemeje ko vyahsitse hakagira abantu basambanywa ku nguvu mu ntambara yabaye mu ntara ya Tigray igihe ingabo za reta mpuzantara zatera umugambwe watwara iyo ntara. Ivyo bibaye inyuma y'aho ONU ivugiye ko yaronse ivyegeranyo vy'amabi afatiye ku gutsina yakozwe muri iyo ntara, harimwo guhatira abantu gusambanya ku nguvu abantu bo mu miryango yabo. "Tumaze kuronka ivyegeranyo vy'umugwi twarungitse gukurikirana ivy'iriya ntara ya Tigray, basanze koko hari abasambanijwe ku nguvu, ivyo bikaba arivyo ata gukekeranya'' nk'uko vyemejwe  n'umushikiranganji w'abagore Filsan Abdullahi avyanditse kuri twitter. Uwo mushikiranganji yavuze ko umugwi ubikurikirana ukiriko uregeranya ibiharuro kugira hamenekanye igitigiri c'abashikiwe n'ayo mahano. Yavuze ko reta iriko 'irongereza ugukingira no kubuza ko haba amabi afatiye ku gitsina mu ntara ya Tigray." Umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed yagomoye igitero c'indege no hasi itariki zine z'ukwezi kwa 11 kugira atuze umugabwe watwara iyo ntara inyuma yo  kwigarurira  amakambi yab gisirikare. Yatangaje intsinzi muri Tigray inyuma y'ukwezi kw'intambara, ariko indongozi za TPLF  n'ubwo bararahiye ko bazobandanya kurwana. Gushika muri Tigray kuracari ikibazo ku miryango ifasha abari mu kaga ishaka gutanga imfashanyo y'ivyo kurya hamwe n'imiti bikenewe cane. Amashirahamwe atanga imfashsnyo avuga ko abantu bangana na miriyoni 4.5 bakeneye gufashwa , abo bakaba ari 60% y'abanya Tigray bose, ariko reta ya Ethiopia yo ivuga ko abantu miriyoni 2.5 ari bo bonyene bakeneye imfashanyo kandi ikemeza ko bose ishobora kubashikira. Umukuru w'Umuryango wa Croisx Rouge yo muri Ethiopia uvuga ko 80% y'abanya Tigray n'ubu badashora gushikirwa n'imfashanyo, kandi ko abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bashobora kwicwa n'inzara vuba.

column2: Lionel Messi afise indoto yo gutsindira Ligue des Champions muri Paris St-Germain
column3: Lionel Messi avuga ko afise indoto yo gusubira gutsindira Ligue des Champions/Champions League inyuma y'aho ashikiye muri Paris St-Germain, akongerako ati: "Nibaza ko hano dufise umurwi ushobora kubishikako". Uyu mukinyi rurangiranwa w'imyaka 34 ari na we kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina, yatsindiye Ligue des Champions incuro zine muri Barcelona, iyo aheruka ikaba ari iyo mu 2015. PSG iracarwana ngo itahukane ku ncuro ya mbere iri higanwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Buraya, mw'ihiganwa rya 2020 ikaba yatsinzwe na Bayern Munich mu rukino rwa nyuma. Igihe yerekanwa nk'umukinyi wa PSG, Messi yavuze ati: "Intumbero n'indoto vyanje ni uko nosubira gutahukana Ligue des Champions". Messi yavuye muri Barcelona yari yinjiyemwo afise imyaka 13 inyuma y'aho uwu murwi wa La Liga unaniriwe no guha ayandi masezerano uyu mukinyi kubera inzitizi zishingiye ku mategeko ajanye n'ikoreshwa ry'amafaranga muri iryo higanwa. Nk'umwe mu bakinyi b'ibihangange baranze amateka y'umupira w'amaguru, Messi yinjije ibitsindo 672 mu nkino 778 yakiniye uwu murwi rurangiranwa w'i Catalan. Yaraciye umuhigo mu gutsindira umupira w'inzahabu (Ballon d'Or) incuro zitandatu, aterura n'ibikombe 35 mu gihe cose yari amaze i Nou Camp, ariko avuga ko ubu aryohewe no gutangura ibihe bishasha mu buzima bwiwe, inyuma y'aho aviriye muri Barcelona "bigoranye". Ari i Parc des Princes (ikibuga ca PSG), yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Yari impinduka igoye cane inyuma y'igihe kirekire cane".  "Ariko maze gushika hano, numvise mfise umunezero mwinshi cane kandi ndipfuza gutangura imyimenyerezo vuba bwango. Nshaka kwihuta". "Ikintu conyene nshaka ubu ni ugutangura imyimenyerezo. Ndashaka gukorana n'abakinyi bagenzanje hamwe n'abakozi, kugira ngo ntangure iki gihe gishasha mu buzima bwanje". "Ndafise iri shaka ryo gukina. Numva ndiko ndaribwaribwa. Numva ngishaka gutsinda nk'uko nabikoze mu gihe ca mbere c'umwuga wanje". "Ndumva ko uwu murwi witeguriye kurwanira ibikombe vyose. Ni ryo hangiro ryanje, nshaka kubandanya ntera imbere ngatsindira ibikombe, iki nico catumye nza muri uno murwi". Kuzana Messi muri uno murwi usanzwe urimwo ibihangange ni intambwe ikomeye kuri PSG mu rugamba rwo kurondera kuba kw'isonga mu mupira w'amaguru i Buraya. Inyuma yo gutsindwa na Manchester City mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mu mwaka w'inkino uheze, mu nyuma igatakaza Ligue 1 yo mu Bufaransa yatsindiwe na Lille, PSG yaronse abakinyi bamaze gutahukana Ligue des Champions, nka Sergio Ramos, Georginio Wijnaldum na Messi. Ariko, Messi arazi neza ko, kugira ngo aterure igikombe ca Ligue des Champions ku ncuro igira gatanu, bishobora gushika agahura na Barcelona, kandi aremera ko gukina i Nou Camp yambaye umwambaro wa PSG vyoba ari ibintu "bigoye cane  kwumva". Yongerako ati: "Barcelona ni muhira kuri jewe - nabayeyo kuva ndi umwana muto kandi nahakoreye ibintu vyinshi cane. "Sinzi ko tuzohura nabo - ariko vyoba biryoshe cane gusubira i Barcelona. "Vyoba ari ibintu bigoye kwumva gukina muhira i Barcelona ndi mu wundi mwambaro ariko birashoboka, reka tuzoraba". Umuzo wa Messi ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubufaransa utumye PSG iba umwe mu mirwi ifise umurongo ukomeye cane w'abasatirizi kw'isi mu mateka y'umupira w'amaguru. Uyu mukinyi agiye gukina ku ruhande rw'abasatirizi muri PSG ari kumwe n'abakinyi babiri bazimvye kurusha abandi mu bihe vyose vyabayeho, aba nabo bakaba ari Neymar bahoze bakinana muri Barcelona, hamwe na Kylian Mbappe. Umukuru wa PSG Nasser Al-Khelaifi aremeza ko kugura Messi bizotuma uwu murwi ushobora kugumana Mbappe, mu gihe amasezerano asanzwe afitaniye nawo azorangira mu 2022. Al-Khelaifi ati: "Yahora yipfuza umurwi ushobora guhiganwa, ubu ndibaza ko dufise umurwi wa mbere ukomeye cane kw'isi, rero nta citwazo ubu afise - nta kindi yokora atari kuguma hano". Avuga ku bijanye n'uko umurwi ukoresha amafaranga y'umurengera, Al-Khelaifi yongeyeko ati: "Ico mwebwe nk'abanyamakuru mukwiye kwibandako gusumba ibindi ni ukuraba iciza azaniye uno murwi hakwibanda ku bintu bibi". "Twabanje kuvugana n'abaduha amafaranga kandi twari tuzi ko dushobora kumuzana. Muri ivyo vyose, twabanje kuraba ko tutorenza urugero mw'ikoreshwa ry'amahera, kandi tuzokurikiza amategeko ngenderwako mw'ikoreshwa ryiza ry'amafaranga".

column2: Mu gihe Amerika iriko irungika izindi ngabo, Irani isaba ingabo mvamahanga kutegera ikigobe c’abarabu
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Irani aragabisha ko ingabo mvamahanga zihungabanya ikigobe c'Abarabu, inyuma y'aho Amerika imenyeshereje ko igiye kurungika ingabo muri ako karere. Perezida Hassan Rouhani avuga ko ingabo mvamahanga zamye "zitera umubabaro n'ubukene". Amerika ivuga ko igiye kurungika izindi ngabo mu gihugu ca Arabia Saoudite inyuma y'igitero giherutse kuba ku bigo bicukura igitoro, ivyo bihugu vyompi bikaba vyagirije Irani ko ari yo yagikoze. Uno mwaka kuva utanguye waranzwe n'icuka kibi hagati ya Amerika na Irani, kuva aho  Perezida Donald Trump  wa Amerika afatiye ingingo y'ukwiyonkora mu masezerano yasaba Irani guheba umugambi w'uguhingura ibirwanisho vy'ubumara, nayo igatezurirwa ibihano yafatiwe. Ibintu vyagiye gusubira kwunyuka igihe habereye ibitero vya drone n'ibisasu vya misile ku bigo bicukura igitoro vy'ahitwa Abqaiq na Khurais ku wa 14 z'uku kwezi kw'icenda. Abarwanya ubutegetsi bw'igihugu ca Yemen bitwa Houthi  nibo biyitiriye ico gitero, ariko Amerika na Arabia Saoudite - umwansi wa mbere wa Irani muri ako karere - vyagiriza Irani ko ari yo yagikoze, ivyo ico gihugu ciyamiriza civuye inyuma. Ijambo ryiwe yarishikirije mu birori vy'ukwibuka umunsi haduka intambara hagati ya Irani na Iraki yabaye kuva mu 1980 gushika mu 1988, ibirori vyaranzwe n'amadefire y'igisirikare ku mugwa mukuru wa Irani no mu bindi bisagara vy'igihugu. Mw'ijambo ryiwe ryaciye kumboneshakure y'ico gihugu yavuze ati: "Ingabo mvamahanga zishobora gutera ingorane n'umutekano muke ku banyagihugu bacu no mu karere kacu". Avuga ko muri kahise zateye akaga, akazisaba kuguma iwabo. "Nimba koko bafise umutima, ni bareke kugira akarere kacu ikiririmbiro ry'ibirwanisho … Uko muzogenda mureka kwivanga mu biraba akarere kacu n'ibihugu vyacu, niho numutekano uzogenda usasagara". Ubushikiranganji bw'ukwivuna abansi bwa Amerika, Pentagon, bwatangaje ku munsi wa gatanu ko buzorungika ingabo nkeya muri Arabia Saoudite kubera yabisavye, zikazoba ahanini zigizwe n'abajejwe kurwanira mu kirere be no gukinga ibitero vya misire. Umunyamabanga ajejwe kwivuna abansi, Mark Esper, avuga ati: "Tuzokora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo turungike mu maguru masha ibikoresho vya gisirikare". Iryo tangazo ryariyamirijwe cane n'igisata kijejwe gukingira ubutegetsi bwa ki isilamu, Revolutionary Guard Corps, igisata c'igisirikare ca Irani, gifatwa  na Amerika nk'umurwi w'iterabwoba. Umukuru w'ico gisata, Jenerali-Majoro Hossein Salami avuga ati: "Uwo ari we wese ashaka ko igihugu ciwe kiba ikiririmbiro ry'intambara, n'abandanye. Ariko muhagabire, agasotoro ntikazoguma ari agasotoro. Tuzokurikirana uwo ari we wese azodusotora".

column2: Burundi-CVR: 'Nimba ukuri ari ukuje gutera indyane mu gihugu, ntaco kwoba kumaze', Ndayishimiye
column3: Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko mu gihe "ukuri kwoza gutuma mu gihugu haduka indyane twopfuma tuguheba", yabivugiye mu kiganiro yahaye abanyagihugu kuri uyu wa gatatu, aho yasiguye yongera yishura ku bibazo bitari bike bijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu. Asigura ibijanye n'ukumenya ukuri ku bwicanyi bwabaye mu 1972-73, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko "kumenya ukuri atari ikibazo", ko ahubwo "kwodufasha kwubaka akahise kacu, abana bacu baze bamenye ikizira n'ikitazira". Ati: "Turi mu bihe vy'ukumenya ukuri, ariko rero, …ni kwaba uko kuri ari ukuje gutuma indyane ziba mu gihugu, uko kuri ntaco kwoba kumaze". Haciye imisi umurwi ujewe kumenya ukuri n'ukunywanisha mu Burundi,  CVR,   utangaje ko ubwicanyi bwabaye mu 1972-1973 ari "ihonyabwoko ryakorewe Abahutu", ivyateye impari mu Barundi bamwe bamwe, bavuga ko ico cegeranyo gifise aho gihengamiye canke ko bimwe mu bikivugwamwo ari "ikinyoma". Ku bwa Perezida Ndayishimiye, iyo ukuri kumaze kuboneka haba hasigaye ingene igihugu kigukoresha. Ati: "Mugabo rero hariho abandi baca basimba, bagaca barondera ingene bagukoresha, ivyo bijejwe inzego z'igihugu, zozo zizomenya ingene zigukoresha ziravye ico abenegihugu bazovuga". Yemerera Abarundi ko indongozi zizotegerezwa gukora uko zishoboye kwose "kugira ngo uko kuri kutwubake, kwubake kazoza k'Uburundi, gukure ivyo kwihorana". Akebura ko mu gihe ukuri kutamenyekanye bishobora gutuma ubwicanyi bubandanya. "Dutegerezwa kumenya ko kwica ari icaha gikomeye cane, hanyuma tukakirwaniriza hamwe. Rero uko kuri nti kuje kudusambura, kuje ahubwo kutwubaka". Ku bijanye n'ico cegeranyo ku bwicanyi bwa 1972-73, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko cashikirijwe inama nshingamateka, iyi nayo ikazogishikana mu rwego nshingwabikorwa rw'igihugu, na rwo ruheze rwiture abize amategeko kugira  bagice irya n'ino, kugira bemeze niba ari icaha mpuzamakungu n'abagikoze. Ku bafise ubwoba kuri iki cegeranyo, Perezida Evariste avuga ati: "Abarundi ni tuve mu bishobisho, nta bwoko bwagize jenoside mu Burundi, nta bwoko bwagize icaha c'ihonyabwoko mu Burundi". Ku bwa Perezida Ndayishimiye, bamwe mu Barundi bafise ubwoba kuko hamye ingeso yo kujaniranya, hakaba abitirira ikibi kanaka ubwoko kanaka "nk'uko umengo cari igihugu kitagira ubutegetsi". Evariste Ndayishimiye yemeza ko ubutegetsi bw'ico gihe ari bwo bubazwa ubu bwicanyi buteye impari. Ati: "Nta muntu n'umwe yonsigurira ingene hoba umurwi w'abantu wogenda ukagandagura abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, ntihagire ico ubutegetsi bukora ataco buwuziko". "Ni twemere neza ko ubutegetsi bw'igihugu bw'ico gihe bwamenje". Avuga ko bamwe mu bari muri bwo batanze ukuri barashinga intahe y'ukuntu vyagenze. Nayo ku bavuga ko ishirahamwe ONU ari ryo ryoba rifise ububasha bwo kwemeza icaha ca jenoside, Perezida Ndayishimiye avyamirira kure kuko "nta na hamwe vyanditse". "Igitabo mpanavyaha c'Uburundi, kirahana neza ivyaha vy'ihonyabwoko, amakungu si yo mucamanza w'Uburundi, ONU si reta y'Uburundi". "Icaha ca jenoside cemezwa n'amategeko mpanavyaha y'Uburundi". Abajijwe nimba abanyaporitike bahunze bagirizwa amabi bashobora kugirirwa ikigongwe, Perezida Ndayishimiye, avuga y'uko bizovana n'ingene igihugu gishobora kuvyakira. Ati: "Igihe Papa Johani Paulo wa kabiri bamurasa, uwamurashe yaramugiriye ikigongwe, mbere araja no kumuraba aho abohewe, ariko ntiyaciye ataha, igihugu nticaciye kimugirira ikigongwe. "Burya rero ibijanye n'ikigongwe, ubanza kuraba ingene igihugu kivyakira, nimba agatima k'ubukoko karavuye muri uyo muntu, kandi nimba ashobora gusubira mu bandi agatekana neza. "Mwarabonye abantu bagiriwe ikigongwe mu baheruka, ubwo nyene baca basubira kwica abantu, basubira gufatwa baja mu gasho. None nk'abo bantu wumva tutagize amakosa kubarekura?" Abajijwe ku bivugwa vy'uko urwego rujejwe igendereza ruhohotera abantu, mbere hakaba hari n'uwuherutse kuhasiga ubuzima, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye nawe avuga ko uwabikoze yamenje kandi ko ategerezwa guhanwa. Avuga ko abakora ivyo bintu bashobora kuba bari muri ba bantu "baja gukora mu mabanga y'igihugu bafise inzigo", bafitiye akarigangamuhogo  abantu. Ati: "Muhora mwumva abapolisi bafata abantu bakabapfunga muri weekend kugira bazorekurwe ku wa mbere. Hariho Abarundi bagifise agakoko mu mitima". Mu misi iheze, hari umunywanyi w'umugambwe CNL yafashwe yagirijwe gutunga inkoho, arasinzikarizwa ubuzima gushika aritaba Imana. Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko yababajwe n'urupfu rwiwe, kandi ko uwabikoze yafashwe kugira ashiwe imbere y'ubutungane. "Uyo muntu yamuhohoteye yaramenje kandi ategerezwa guhanwa bimwe vy'akarorero. Ntituzokwihanganira na rimwe umuntu uwo ari we wese azohohotera uwundi, n'aho azoba yakoze ikibi, agateka kiwe kaguma kubahiriwa". Nayo ku kibazo c'abanyuruzwa, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko bikorwa n'akarwi k'inkozi z'ikibi kihaye kwama gatuntuza abarundi. Avuga ko bariko barahiga abagize ako karwi "kandi hari abamaze gufatwa muri bo, mbere dusanga harimwo n'umupolisi". Avuga ko abakora ubwo bubisha ari ababá bashaka kwerekana ko ubutegetsi bw'igihugu ari bwo bunyuruza abantu. Ati: "Nico gituma ubona baca bahindukiza, ngo ni uburongozi bw'igihugu. None Uburongozi bw'igihugu bwoba ari bwo bwabikoze bugaca buja guhiga abo bantu?"

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Bellingham, Ronaldo, Gabriel, Spence, Zinchenko
column3: Real Madrid yahindukiriye umwongereza Jude Bellingham w’imyaka 19 akina hagati  muri Borussia Dortmund, avugwa kandi ko aronderwa na Liverpool. (Marca) Umuserukizi wa Frenkie de Jong yabwiye Manchester United ko uyu mukinyi wo hagati wa Hollande w’imyaka 25 yemera kuva muri Barcelona ariko akaba adashaka kwimukira muri Old Trafford. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Barca iriko iraraba nimba ikwiye kutajana De Jong mu bakinyi bazofata urugendo ruzobashikana muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kugira ngo yemere kwimukira muri uyo murwi w’Amashetani atukura (Red Devils). (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Umusatirizi wa Manchester United Cristiano Ronaldo ariteguye kwanka umushahara yemerewe n’umurwi wo muri Arabie Saoudite mu gihe, Bayern Munich na Atletico Madrid irondera uyu munya Portugal w’imyaka 37. (ESPN) Juventus yegereye Arsenal mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa Brezili Gabriel Magalhaes w’imyaka 24 kugira irabe ko yosubiriza umunya Hollande akina inyuma Matthijs de Ligt w’imyaka 22 yiteze kwimukira muri Bayern Munich. (Independent) Barcelona irarondera umwongereza akina hagati Carney Chukwuemeka w’imyaka 18 asigaje umwaka umwe gusa mu masezerano afitaniye na Aston Villa . (Mundo Deportivo – mu ki Espagnol) Arsenal iriko irarondera ingene yoronka umukinyi w’inyuma wa Ukraine  ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu Oleksandr Zinchenko w’imyaka 25 asanzwe akina muri Manchester City. (The Athletic) Arsenal kandi iriko iraraba ko yogura umunya-Espagne akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu Sergio Gomez w’imyaka 21 asanzwe akina muri Anderlecht. Mu gihe boronka Zinchenko canke Gomez, Nuno Tavares ashobora guca agenda, mu gihe Marseille isanzwe irondera uyu munya-Portugal w’imyaka 22 akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu. (Fabrizio Romano, Twitter) Leeds United iri hafi yo kwemera amasezerano y’imiriyoni 25 z’ama euros na Paris St-Germain kugira ishobore kugura umusatirizi w’umufaransa Arnaud Kalimuendo w’imyaka 20. (90min) Newcastle United iriko irategura imiriyoni 20 z’amapawundi kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wo hagati wa Leeds United umwongereza Jack Harrison w’imyaka 25, ariko uyu murwi rwa Elland Road ushobora kuba umushakako amafaranga menshi. (Mail) Ibiganiro birabandanya hagati ya Arsenal n’abaserukizi b’umukinyi wo hagati wa Leicester umubirigi Youri Tielemans w’imyaka 25. (Football London) Arsenal kandi iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Lyon Lucas Paqueta w’imyaka 24 ariko ntiramenyesha amafaranga ishaka gutanga kuri uno munya-Brezili. (Media Foot – mu gifaransa) Everton iracari mu biganiro na Wolves kugira irabe ko yoronka umwongereza akina hagati Morgan Gibbs-White w’imyaka  22, inyuma y’aho igiciro c’imiriyoni 22 z’amapawundi cankiwe mu ndwi iheze. (Sky Sports) Newcastle United iriko iraronderera ahandi inyuma y’aho ikuriye meza mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Real Sociedad umunya Suède Alexander Isak w’imyaka 22, be n’umufaransa akina ku ruhande Moussa Diaby w’imyaka 23 asanzwe akina muri Bayer Leverkusen, kubera amafaranga asabwa mu kubagura be n’imishahara. (Telegraph) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Bayern Munich umudagi Leroy Sane w’imyaka 26 yemerewe kwinjira muri Real Madrid. (Marca) Paris St-Germain iripfuza umusatirizi wa Benfica umunya Portugal Goncalo Ramos w’imyaka  21, be n’umusatirizi wa Reims umufaransa Hugo Ekitike w’imyaka  20. (Fabrizio Romano, Twitter) PSG kandi irarondera umufaransa akina hagati Khephren Thuram w’imyaka 21, umuhungu w’uwahoze akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubufaransa Lilian Thuram, asanzwe akina muri Nice. (L'Equipe - in French) West Ham yemeye guha Sassuolo imiriyoni 40 z’ama-euros ku musatirizi w’umutaliyano Gianluca Scamacca w’imyaka23, mu gihe PSG yoyo yemeye ko yotanga imiriyoni 35 z’ama euros. (Fabrizio Romano, Twitter) AC Milan iriteguye guha ayandi masezerano mashasha y’igihe kirekire umunya-Portugal akina ku ruhande Rafael Leao mu gihe idashaka kugurisha uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 23 muri Chelsea ku giciro ico ari co cose kiri musi y’imiriyoni 127 z’amapawundi. (Mail) Cesc Fabregas w’imyaka 35 ariteguye kuja gukinira umurwi wo mu cicaro ca kabiri (Serie B) mu Butaliyano, Como, inyuma yo kuva muri Monaco. (Gianluca di Marzio) Southampton na Leicester irarondera umwongereza akina inyuma Levi Colwill, yamaze umwaka w’inkino uheze akina muri Huddersfield yari yatijijwemwo. Uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 19 ntarasaba ko yova burundu muri Chelsea ariko aripfuza ko kazoza kiwe gatomoreka. (CBS Sports, Twitter) Crystal Palace ishobora kwinjira mu rugamba rwo kurondera Colwill, mu gihe Arsenal, Brighton na Everton nayo nyene imurondera. (Mail)

column2: Inyuma y’aho vyankiye ko agenda, Messi yakiniye Barcelona ubwa mbere
column3: Lionel Messi yashoboye gukinira Barcelona ku ncuro ya mbere inyuma y'aho vyankiye ko ava muri uyu murwi, hari mu rukino rwa nijoro  rwa kivandimwe n'umurwi Gimnastic de Tarragona muri Espanye. Mu kwezi kw'umunani, uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 33 akomoka muri Argentine yarasavye ko yova muri Barcelona ariko mu ndwi iheze akaba yafashe ingingo yo kuguma muri uyu murwi kubera habuze umurwi ushikana igiciro kimusabwako. Messi yashoboye gukina muri uru rukino rwarangiye Barcelona itsinze uyo murwi kuri 3-1. Yagiye gusubirizwa co kimwe n'abandi bari batanguranye igice ca mbere giheze. Muri uru rukino, Ousmane Dembele niwe yatanguye gutsinda, mu nyuma Antoine Griezmann na Phillipe Coutinho baza gutsinda ibindi kuri ya mipira itererwa ku metero 11 (penalties). Messi, umusatirizi amaze gutsindira Barcelona ibitsindo vyinshi, yavuga ko mu masezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi harimwo ingingo yamwemerera kugenda ata gisabwe. Ibi vyamutumye mbere atanitabira umunsi wa mbere w'imyimenyerezo yo kwitegurira ihiganarwa ry'umwaka w'inkino waraye utanguye. Barcelona hamwe n'abarongoye ihiganwa rya Espanye, La Liga, babandanije berekana ko iyi ngingo itari igifise agaciro, bikaba vyasabwa ko umurwi uwo ari wo wose womwipfuza wategerezwa kumugura ku giciro c'imiliyoni 700 z'ama euros. Messi yahavuye asubira mu myimenyerezo amaze kumenyesha ko adashaka kwitwarira Barcelona muri sentare. Ihiganwa rya La Liga ryaraye ritanguye icese, co kimwe na Premier League mu Bwongereza, ariko bikaba bitegekanijwe ko Barcelona ikina urukino rwa mbere ku wa 27 z/uku kw'icenda, aho izohura na Villarreal.

column2: Umunsi wahariwe abagore: Mu Burundi ngo baraciye akenge ko kwishira hamwe
column3: Mu gihe isi yaraye ihimbaje umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakenyezi n'iterambere ryabo, muri iyi ndwi turacihweza aho isemo igeze kuri iki kibazo c'uburinganire ku burenganzira hagati y'abagabo n'abagore. Mu Burundi, abagore ngo baramaze guca akenge ko kwishira hamwe mu migwi yo gukorera hamwe, bikabatuma kuronka umutahe no kugwiza umwimbu n'ubwo ibibazo bitabuze. Kimwe mu bibazo nyamukuru bisigaye ni ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina, aho mu ntara zigera kuri 19, harangwa ibigo bitatu gusa bishobora kwakira no gufasha mu buryo bwa mbere abakorewe ayo mabi. Ariko rero ngo ibintu biriko birahinduka mu nzira nziza. Ivyo Florentine Kwizera yabibwiwe n'uwujejwe umugambi w'iterambere ridakumira mw'ishirahamwe ACORD Burundi, Mme Sophie Havyarimana (umviriza ikiganiro aho hejuru ukanze kw'ifoto)

column2: Australia: 'Abanyamahanga batubahiriza amategeko ya Covid bazirukanwa'
column3: Umushikiranganji ajejwe abimukira muri Australia yavuze ko abanyamahanga bazofatwa bariko bararenga ku mategeko ajanye n'amagara y'abantu bashobora gusubizwa iwabo. Alex Hawke yavuze ko yababajwe cane n'ivyo yabonye kuri 'beach' ya Bronte i Sydney ku musi wa Noheli. Video y'abantu benshi yashizwe ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi yerekana urwaruka ruririmba rwongera rutamba, rurenze ku mategeko yo kugwanya coronavirus. Bamwe mu babiboneye bavuze ko benshi bari abongereza. Ingabo zidasanzwe za Australia zagirizwa kwica abasivire muri Afghanistani Uko inyoni ya gasuku yarokoye nyirayo wari ugiye guhira mu nzu Virusi ya Covid imara 'iminsi 28 itarapfa' muri 'laboratoire' Australia iri mu rugamba rwo kugwanya ico kiza giherutse kwongerekana inyuma y'amezi atari make ata muntu abonetse yanduriye mu gihugu hagati. Iyaduka bushasha bw'uwo mugera indwi imwe imbere ya Noheli ryatumye hasubira gushirwaho ayandi mategeko yo kwikingira muri ico gisagara, harimwo kubuza amakoraniro menshi mu biruhuko no kwiyugarana mu karere kamerewe nabi ka Northern Beaches. Ubu abamaze gufatwa muri iryo yongerekana ry'ico kiza bashika 129. Hawke yabwiye radio Sydney ati:"Mu gihe umuntu ageramiye umutekano w'abantu c'anke amagara, viza yiwe ishobora gufutwa ." Yavuze ko yasavye ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu gukorana n'abategetsi ba New South Wales (NSW) muri iyi misi himirije umwaka mushasha kugira ngo umuntu wese azofatwa "akora ibintu bidakurikije amategeko", viza yiwe izoce isubira kwihwezwa na reta. Yavuze ko benshi mu bafise viza z'akanya gato bubahiriza amategeko y'amagara y'abantu. Igipolisi kivuga ko ata n'umwe mu bari mu musi mukuru i Bronte yaciwe amande canke ngo ahanwe. Australia yarugaye imbibe ku bantu nka bose kiretse ku benegihugu batashe canke abafise uruhusha rwo kuba muri ico gihugu n'imiryango yabo mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Mu kwezi kwa kane, reta yavuze ko hariyo abantu barenga imiliyoni zibiri bafise viza y'umwanya muto muri ico gihe.

column2: Kuki Uburundi buza imbere mu bihugu  bikenye cane kw’isi?
column3: Reta y’Uburundi ikwiye kuva mu majambo ikaja mu bikorwa kugira ngo ishobore kwikura mu kabaregwa ko kwitwa igihugu gikenye kurusha ibindi kw’isi, niko Faustin Ndikumana, umukuru w’ishirahamwe PARCEM, ahanura. Ibanki y’isi yose iheruka gusohora icegeranyo c’umwaka wa 2021 ku butunzi n’imibereho y’abanyagihugu gishira Uburundi mu kibanza c’inyuma, ivyatumye benshi bongera kwihweza kw’iterambere ry’Uburundi. Mu kiganiro na BBC, Ndikumana avuga ko imwe mu ngorane nyamukuru Uburundi bufise ari igiturire, akavuga ko mbere ‘ivyo kukirwanya biriko birasubira inyuma ugereranije n’uko vyari bimeze kera’. Mu gihe umukuru w’igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye yiyemeje kurwanya igiturire, Ndikumana abona ko ubutungane kuri we ari inzitizi ikomeye. Ati: “Agerageza gute kukirwanya mu gihe ubutungane butariko burakora. Ugushaka ndavyumva, mugabo ubutungane butariko burakora, ntashobora kuvuga ngo uriko urarwanya igiturire”. Umukuru w’iri shirahamwe ryishinze gukangurira Abarundi guhindura ingendo abona ko Uburundi budashobora guterimbere mu gihe hakiri ibihushane iyo hageze gushira mu ngiro imigambi y’iterambere. Iki cegeranyo c’ibanki y’isi yose ku mwimbu rusangi mu gihugu (Produit National Brut, PIB) ku muntu mu 2021, cerekana ko Uburundi buza mu kibanza ca 195 kuri 196 aho Umurundi umwe aronka USD 240 gusa ku mwaka wose. Ndikumana avuga ko bapima ibi bisunze “umwimbu wimburwa mu gihugu kanaka kuko niwo uba werekana ubutunzi igihugu kiba gifise, hanyuma bagaca baraba abanyagihugu ingene bangana, umwimbu cimbura mu bisata bitandukanye ugaca ugabanganywa ku banyagihugu bakibamwo, baca baraba rero ico umunyegihugu umwe umwe wese yoba aronka”. “Ni nk’uko wofata urugo kanaka rurimwo umugore n’umugabo n’abana icenda nk’akarorero, ugaharura ivyo bimbura ku kwezi, amahera baronka ku kwezi, ugaca uyagabura rero na cumi na rimwe, ari ho rero uca ubona amahera umuntu umwe umwe muri urwo rugo ashobora kuronka ku kwezi”. “Urumva n’ingo zirasumbana, hariho ingo zimbura vyinshi. Amahera yinjira ari menshi. Uko muza kuyagabura muri bake, niko ukubaho neza guca kwiyongera. Iyo muyagabura muri benshi nayo ari make, ubukene buca bwiyongera”. Ku ruhande rw’Uburundi, Faustin Ndikumana abona ko Uburundi bwimbura bike ariko bugategerezwa kugaburira abantu benshi, bigatuma bwama buboneka ko bukenye. Uburundi ni igihugu kibeshejweho ahanini n’uburimyi, ibiharuro bikerekana ko 90% ari bo babeshejweho n’isuka. Icegeranyo c’ikigo ISTEEBU kijejwe kwegeranya ibiharuro giherutse gusohora icegeranyo co mu mwaka wa 2019-2020 cerekana ko abarundi 40% bashobora kumara umusi wose badafunguye. Ibi biri uku mu gihe abarongoye igihugu bavuga ko umwimbu ari wose. Mu gihe yariko ashikiriza abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka ivyaranguwe n’ubushikiranganji butandukanye mu gice ca kabiri c’umwaka uheze hari mu kw’icumi kw’umwaka uheze nyene ari nawo iki cegeranyo cerekeye,  umushikiranganji wa mbere Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni  yavuze ko muri ico gihe honyene igihugu cari gifise amatoni menshi y’umusesekara ku mwibu w’ibigori. Ndikumana abona ko reta n’abakora ivyegeranyo nk’ibi badahuza kubera reta yoyo ikunda gukoresha imvugo ya poritike. Ati: “Wewe uri mu mabanga, bavuze uko ibintu bimeze birashobora kutakunezera kuko bica vyerekana ko umengo utariko uratunganya ibintu neza. “Imvugo ya poritike sico kimwe n’iy’abahinga, ni naco gituma turiko turasubirira n’inyuma, umunyeporitike wewe yivugira poritike aho kuraba ivyo abahinga bavuga”. Mu gusigura ingorane Uburundi bufise zituma bwama buri inyuma mu butunzi, Faustin Ndikumana afatira ku gitabo ishirahamwe ryiwe riherutse gusohora, aho ryihweza imyaka 60 Uburundi bumaze bwikukiye, n’imyaka ibiri y’ubutegetsi bwa Evariste Ndayishimiye. Muri iki gitabo, yerekana ko imigambi itegurwa ariko ko, iyo hageze kuyishira mu ngiro, “umengo hariko hakorwa ibihushane n’ivyategerezwa kuba biriko birakorwa kugira dushikire intumbero y’iterambere”. Asigura bimwe muri ibi bihushane biri muri iki gitabo, ica mbere ciyongera ku giturire avuga ko “tugomba guterimbere mu gihe tuvuga ko Uburundi bwikwiye kandi ivyegeranyo vyerekana ko ari ubwanyuma k’isi mu bihugu bitunze”. Ati: “Uwuja gukira indwara arayirata, none wewe nimba urwaye indwara, ntiwemere ko uyirwaye, wumva uzoyikira gute? Banza wemere ko ukenye”. Imvo ya kabiri ashikiriza abona ko igihugu kigomba  gutera imbere mu gihe atanzira irashe yo kugiteza imbere ihari ifatiye ku citegererezo c'uko ahandi bigenda. Ati: “Turagenda tukandika ibitabo, ngo plan national de developpement, tukandika, tugakora amanama, ngo dushaka gufata intumbero mugabo izo recommendations tugaca tubika. “Gushika ubu nta kintu na kimwe ca programme-vision usanga reta iriko irakorerako”. Ariko rero, hano ntabona ibintu kumwe na reta ufatiye ku vyo umushikiranganji wa mbere Bunyoni yabwiye abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka mu kw’icumi kw’umwaka uheze, ari nawo urabwa n’uru rutonde rw’Ibanki y’isi yose, aho yemeza ko integuro ya reta y’igice ca kabiri yakozwe neza mbere hisunzwe uburyo buvuye hagati mu gihugu, akavuga ko ari na ko vyagenze mu gice ca mbere. Yavuze kandi ko n’ibikorwa bishika 290 vyaranguwe neza hisunzwe integuro ya reta kandi ku rugero rwa 79% ku bushikiranganji bwayiranguye ku rugero ruto, be no kuri 97% ku bushikiranganji bwavyitwayemwo neza gusumba ubundi.  Yemeza ko muri rusangi imigambi reta yari ifise yashizwe mu ngiro ku rugero rwa 88%, mu gihe mu gice ca mbere yaranguwe ku rugero rwa 81%. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji wa mbere Bunyoni yaremeje ko ubutunzi bw’igihugu muri ico gice bwagabanutse kubera ikiza karanda ca Covid-19, mbere ko hari n’ibindi bikorwa vyari bitegekanijwe bitashoboye kuranguka. Imvo ya gatatu atanga, avuga ko Uburundi budashobora gutera imbere mu gihe gutanga akazi hatisungwa ubushobozi n’ubumenyi. Ati: “Wewe uvuga ko ushaka gutera imbere gute udashira imbere incabwenge, abashoboye akazi, ubushakashatsi ngo ubushire imbere, mu nzego nyinshi ugasanga abantu bariko bahabwa amabanga badakurikiza ubushobozi, mu gihe ubu ata n’ibigo vy’ubushakashatsi bihari...none wotera imbere gute”? Ikindi gihushane yerekana, ni uko igihugu kigomba gutera imbere “mu gihe ata buryo buhari bwo kuzana amafaranga mvamakungu mu gihugu kugira afashe mukuzibira ikinogo c’amafaranga Uburundi budafise kandi yongere afashe mw’iboneka ry’amafaranga y’agaciro”. Ati: “Mbega iryo terambere uzorironka gute? Uzokoresha amarundi? N’aho worara urayafyatura, ukayarwiza muri BRB ntaco azokumarira”. PARCEM ibona ko amasoko yashobora gutuma igihugu kironka aya mafaranga asa n’ayadakora neza. Ati: “... raba n’ikawa yasubiye inyuma, icayi casubiye inyuma, igisata c’ubukerarungendo ntitugiteza imbere kugira ngo bazane amadevises, raba n’amafaranga y’agaciro yovuye mu nzahabu n’ubutare urabona ko vyanse ...none ushaka gutera imbere gute?” “Nta barwizatunga bazana imitahe mu gihugu; kwaka ingurane ntibikunda kuko usanga badashobora kwizera inzego, badashobora kuzizera ku buryo boziha ingurane y’amafaranga aboneka”. Ikindi gihushane PARCEM ibona gihagaze kw’ikoreshwa ry’amafaranga ya reta ibona ko harimwo igipfungu. Ati: “Wewe woza gutera imbere gute mu gihe n’ingene reta ikoresha amafaranga ata muco urimwo, umengo amafaranga akoreshwa mu kanywababo, amafaranga adakurikiza imigambi y’iterambere izwi, amafaranga atwarirwa mu gifuri, za cour des comptes zitayakontorora?”. Mu mwaka uheze wa 2021, Prezida Ndayishimiye yumvikanye anegura bikomeye abo mu nzego zitandukanye n'abamufasha imirimo y'igihugu abagiriza  kuba aribo batuma ibintu bitagenda neza mu gihugu. Ni mu gihe yaheruka “kuririra imbere” y’abacamanza kw'izina ry'abenegihugu, aho yavuga ko batakironka ubutungane bubereye kubera abo bacamanza bamunzwe n'ibiturire. Umukuru w’iri shirahamwe rihamagarira abantu guhindura ingendo abona ko umukuru w'igihugu afise utwigoro kandi ko n’amajambo ashikiriza atanga icizere, ariko ko abari musi yiwe batamufasha.

column2: Diamond League Doha: Francine Niyonsaba ati 'Iyi ntsinzi ni iyo gutera intege abandi'
column3: "Ni umunezero ntangere kubona ngarutse i Doha ubwa kabiri inyuma y'ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ryo mu 2019 kandi nkaba ntsinze". "Ndanezerewe cane kandi ndashimira abamfashije bose. Narakoze cane kugira ngo mbe umunonotsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru. Mva mu gahutu gato, iyi ntsinzi ni iyo gutera intege abandi". Niyo majambo wa munonotsi rurangiranwa w'umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba yavuze nijoro atahukanye intsinzi mu gusiganwa ku metero 3000 mu mahiganwa ya Diamond League Doha ku ruhande rw'abagore/abakobwa. Niyonsaba yatsinze umunyakenyakazi yahabwa amahirwe menshi,  Faith Kipyegon, ku mwanya w'iminota 8:37.70 nayo uyu mukeba akaba yarangije mu mwanya w'iminota 8:40:97. Iyi ni itsinzi ije ikurikira iyo yaheruka kuronka , mu kwandika amateka mashasha ku metero 2000 mw'ihiganwa Continental Tour Gold ryabereye i Zagreb mu gihugu ca Croatia, hari mu kwezi kw'icenda umwaka uheze wa 2021. Ico gihe, ku mwanya yakoresheje w'iminota itanu n'amasegonda 21.56, yasumbije Genzebe Dibaba yaheruka guca umuhigo mu mahiganwa yo mu kibuga cugaye (indoors) mu 2017, akaba yamusize amasegonda abiri. Muri uko kwezi nyene, uyu mononotsi w'imyaka 29 ubu yari yatsinze umunyakenyakazi Hellen Obiri  mu metero 5000 mw'ihiganwa rya Diamond League i Zurich. Amateka yiyongera ku yandi kuri uyu munonotsi rurangiranwa yatanguye asiganwa ku metero 800 abikora bigacika mu gutsindira umudari w'ifeza mu mahiganwa ya Rio olympics yabereye i Rio muri Brezili, ariko mu nyuma urwego mpuzamakungu rukamufatira ingingo yo kudasubira guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na 1600. Uru rwego rwamwagiriza ko afise inkabuzo (imisemburo) y'igitsinagabo ya testosterone irenze urugero, agategekwa gufata imiti yo kugabanya uru rugero kugira ngo yemererwe gusubira guhiganwa kuri izo ntera. Kubera iyo ngingo yafatiwe mu 2018, Francine yaciye yimukira ku ntera yo hejuru, akaba amaze gusiganwa nko ku metero 2000, 3000, 5000, 10000 kandi hose agenda yerekana ubushobozi bwiwe. Mu kw'icenda kw'umwaka uheze, abajijwe ico avuga ku vyariko bisabwa na bamwe bamwe ko igisata kijejwe kwinonora imitsi, World Athletics, cokwongereza intera atosubira guhiganwamwo kubera urugero rwiwe rwa testosterone, Francine yaritwengeye yivugira ko yari yiteguriye guhindura. Ati: "Ndashobora kwimukira ku ntera zo hejuru! Canke nkaja mu rwego rwo gusimba!"

column2: DR Congo: Inama nshingamateka yabogoje umukuru wayo asanzwe acuditse na Kabila
column3: Inama nshingamateka ya Repubulika y'Intwaro rusangi ya Congo yemeje ko umukuru wayo abogozwa. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho inama nshingamateka isohoreye urwandiko rwo kwiyamiriza uyu mukuru w'inama nshingamateka, Jeanine Mabunda, asanzwe acuditse cane na Josepf Kabila, hamwe n'abo bakorana, bakagirizwa uburongozi bubi. Iyi ni intsinzi kuri Perezida Félix Tshisekedi amaze igihe atumvikana n'uwo yasubiriye, Perezida Kabila. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, haradutse akaguma mu nama nshingamateka, biba ngombwa ko igipolisi kiza kubanguranya abari bashamiranye. Jeanine Mabunda, umukuru w'iyi nama nshingamateka, ni akadasohoka na Josepf Kabila, akaba yabogojwe n'amajwi 281 kuri 200. Niwe mukenyezi wa mbere yari yizigiwe ngo arongore inama nshingamateka ya Congo, ariko mu nyuma ico cizere bari bamuhaye kikaba cagiye gisubira inyuma. Abashingamateka begamiye ku ruhande rwa Perezida Tshisekedi bamwagiriza ko ahengamira ku ruhande rwa Kabila mu ngingo ziwe, arico gituma yabogojwe. Wewe arahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Aya matora yatumye abashingamateka benshi baja ku ruhande rwa Perezida Tshisekedi. Ubu rero, ni akanya keza kuri we ko gushira mu ngiro imigambi yatangaje ku wa Mungu uheze, harimwo gushinga reta nshasha avuga ko yomworohereza gukorera bikwiye abanyagihugu ba Congo. Iri bogozwa ry'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ni uruhombo rudasanzwe kuri Perezida Kabila, yashikirije ubutegetsi mu mwaka uheze inyuma y'imyaka 18 arongoye iki gihugu. Hagti aho, n'aho yari yashikirije ubutegetsi amaze gutsindwa mu matora, yagumanye ibibanza vyinshi mu nama nshingamateka y'igihugu, co kimwe no mu nama nshingamateka z'uburere.

column2: South Africa yizeye kuronka incanco z'umugera wa coronavirus mu kwezi kuza
column3: Africa y'Epfo yizigiye kuronka incanco za Covid-19 mu kwezi kuza, ariko ivyo biterwa 'uko ibiganiro n'ibigo bizikora bizoba vyagenze neza, nk'uko bivugwa n'umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu. Reta ifise ihangiro ryo guha urucanco nibura 67 kw'ijana y'abanyagihugu bose-n'ukuvuga abarenga hafi miliyoni 40.3-gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka kugira haboneke ubudahangarwa kuri iyo ndwara. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu Zweli Mkhize yavuze ko gushika bamaze kuronka incanco zikwiye kugira bakingire 10 kw'ijana vy'abanyagihugu. Yavugiye mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku wa mungu ko gutangura gutanga izo ncanco bitegerezswa ''gukorwa mu buryo bwihuta''. Yanavuze kandi ko reta iriko iravugana n'ibigo vyose bikora izo ncanco hamwe n'ivyemera guzitanga vuba kuruta ibindi. Africa y'Epfo cabaye igihugu ca mbere co muri Africa cashikanye abamaze kwandura umugera wa Covid-19 barenga umuliyoni. Mu minsi iheze muri ico gihugu haratowe ishami ry'uwo mugera rinyaruka kwandukira gusumba, vyibazwa ko arico catumye igitigiri c'abandura ciyongera. Ubu Africa y'Epfo yemeza abantu 1.100.748 bamaze kwandura umugera wa Covid-19, abashika 29.577 bamaze gupfa n'abakize 903.679 kuva ico kiza cadutse mu kwezi kwa gagatu guheze.
